_meanings:
{@--1@} Sinned, offended,
having committed an offence, 
guilty, an offender, criminal (used in an
active sense); {#kftavatyasi#} 
{#nAvaDIraRAmaparAdDe'pi yadA ciraM mayi#} <ls>R. 8. 48</ls>; {#provAca#}
{#koSalapatiH praTamAparAdDaH#} <ls n="R.">9. 79</ls> the first
to offend.

{@--2@} Missed, not 
hitting the mark (as an arrow);  
{#mfgadehAparAdDErnAmezumokzaREH#} <ls>Dk. 163</ls>; {#°izuH#} or
{#°pfzatkaH#} an archer whose arrows 
always miss the mark, an unskilful
archer; {#nimittAdaparAdDezorDAnuzkasyeva#} 
{#valgitaM#} <ls>Śi. 2. 27.</ls>
